titleStmt.title: Some queries proposed by W.A. to the late flovvn shepherds, with a desire of an answer from them to these queries, so that their discontented sheep may have some satisfaction why they left them, when the visiting hand of the Lord was amongst them.
titleStmt.author: W. A.
